name: Farts Button
description:
It is a very simple App with only 3 buttons.

2 of these buttons are arrows to select your favourite color for your "fart", there are 10 diferent colors to choose.

The other button is the "fart", if you press it, will sound a fart, (¡There are to many diferents types of farts, the loud, the TwoOne, the PopIt...!)
